snippet: Aaron Harang, 35, was 5-11 for Seattle this season with 5.76 earned run average, and is likely to pitch in the Mets’ doubleheader on Sept. 14.
abstract: Aaron Harang, 35, was 5-11 for Seattle this season with 5.76 earned run average, and is likely to pitch in the Mets’ doubleheader on Sept. 14.

headline.main: Mets Sign Aaron Harang to Minor League Deal
